pull.title: Add block_hash and block_index to transaction info
pull.body: This is only the second part of "txinfo", which is ACK'd.

events.body: ACK (but github says it won't merge cleanly???)

On second thought...

The only other RPC info that has an underscore is "unlocked_until", and I think that was a mistake. It'd be more consistent to make these "blockhash" and "blockindex"

events.message: Add blockhash and blockindex to transaction info

events.body: In case GitHub doesn't email for commits, fixed.
Does not look fixed here.  This commit modifies src/rpc.cpp, which no longer exists.
Git is perfectly capable of following renames.
